dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Hey B, have you, uh, caught wind of the big news from Coventry University?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hey B, have you, uh, caught wind of the big news from Coventry University?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, um, yeah, I think so? Are you talking about the new campus, like, opening up?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, um, yeah, I think so? Are you talking about the new campus, like, opening up?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! They're launching a new campus in Kazakhstan, which is, uh, pretty significant.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! They're launching a new campus in Kazakhstan, which is, uh, pretty significant.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The opening of British universities and schools, such as Coventry University, here in Kazakhstan underscores our commitment to supporting talent development and building the countrys potential, said Kathy Leach, the British Ambassador to Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wow, that *is* big. So, what kind of programs are they actually offering there?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow, that is big. So, what kind of programs are they actually offering there?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, they've got an MBA in Global Business, and then a whole range of Bachelor's degrees – everything from, like, human resource management to computer science and digital marketing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, they've got an M B A in Global Business, and then a whole range of Bachelor's degrees - everything from, like, human resource management to computer science and digital marketing.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The university will offer MBA Global Business and Bachelors degree programs... These include business and human resource management, pedagogy, computer science, information technology management, advertising, digital marketing, and others.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [overlaps] Oh, nice. And I heard something about a special program for teachers too, right? That's, um, pretty unique.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, nice. And I heard something about a special program for teachers too, right? That's, um, pretty unique.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In addition, the university offers a program for teachers, including heads of schools and colleges, to obtain an international postgraduate certificate in education and the status of an internationally qualified teacher.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, absolutely. It's designed for teachers and even school heads to get an international postgraduate certificate. It's actually developed by a Scottish institute and accredited in England.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, absolutely. It's designed for teachers and even school heads to get an international postgraduate certificate. It's actually developed by a Scottish institute and accredited in England.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The program was developed by the National Institute of Teaching and Education in the United Kingdom (NITE) and is accredited by the Department of Education in England.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: That's so crucial, especially with the, you know, growing demand for qualified educators. Kathy Leach, the British Ambassador, really emphasized that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's so crucial, especially with the, you know, growing demand for qualified educators. Kathy Leach, the British Ambassador, really emphasized that.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kathy Leach : We are encouraged by the quality of the educational programs that will be offered at the new campus. In an era when the demand for qualified teachers is constantly growing, such programs are timely and necessary for the development of education in Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. And Craig Blyth from Coventry, uh, he highlighted their global cooperation mission. They're using modern tech, even AI-based tools, and offering flexible learning – face-to-face, online, hybrid.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. And Craig Blyth from Coventry, uh, he highlighted their global cooperation mission. They're using modern tech, even A I-based tools, and offering flexible learning - face-to-face, online, hybrid.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We work in different regions, so we use different training formats and the latest modern technologies, including those based on artificial intelligence. Our mission is to further develop global cooperation. The University provides high-quality education all over the world, both face-to-face, online, and in a hybrid format, as well as offering practical opportunities.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Which is, like, amazing for global connectivity. Students can interact with others from around the world. Plus, a huge bonus: studying there is gonna be way more affordable than going abroad.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which is, like, amazing for global connectivity. Students can interact with others from around the world. Plus, a huge bonus: studying there is gonna be way more affordable than going abroad.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We help students connect with their classmates around the world. Therefore, you will have the opportunity to communicate with students from other countries remotely... It should be noted that studying in Kazakhstan will be much more affordable compared to the cost of education abroad, considering the cost of flight and accommodation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, definitely. And they're even offering competitive grants for applicants with outstanding academic results, or, um, achievements in sports and art.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, definitely. And they're even offering competitive grants for applicants with outstanding academic results, or, um, achievements in sports and art.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: University grants will be awarded on a competitive basis to applicants with outstanding academic results, as well as achievements in sports, art, and other fields, confirmed by prize-winning places in Olympiads and competitions.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: That's fantastic. I mean, Coventry University itself has, like, main campuses in the UK – Coventry, London, Scarborough – and a huge global network already.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's fantastic. I mean, Coventry University itself has, like, main campuses in the U K - Coventry, London, Scarborough - and a huge global network already.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The university has main campuses in Coventry, London, and Scarborough.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [overlaps] Yeah, and Blyth was, uh, saying Kazakhstan is now officially on that global partner list. Which is a huge vote of confidence.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and Blyth was, uh, saying Kazakhstan is now officially on that global partner list. Which is a huge vote of confidence.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I am glad that Kazakhstan will be included in the list of our global partners, Craig Blyth said in his speech.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And they're really stressing that the quality of education at the Kazakhstan campus will be, like, the exact same high level as the UK campuses. Same benefits, same access to technology.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they're really stressing that the quality of education at the Kazakhstan campus will be, like, the exact same high level as the U K campuses. Same benefits, same access to technology.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The quality of education at the universitys campus in Kazakhstan will correspond to the UK campus... Our students in Kazakhstan will have the same benefits and opportunities as other campuses abroad. We provide access to all technologies, and many of our students get their first experience in simulators. Kazakhstani students will also have this opportunity, Craig Blyth stressed.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Which is, uh, super important. And it's all supported locally by Primus Education, who are investing big in Kazakhstan's educational future.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which is, uh, super important. And it's all supported locally by Primus Education, who are investing big in Kazakhstan's educational future.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In Kazakhstan, the Coventry University campus project is being implemented with the support of Primus Education, which is investing in the future of education, aligning with Kazakhstans goal of modernizing its education system.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It just, you know, totally reinforces Coventry's reputation as a leading, innovative university. They were founded back in 1843, too, so they have history.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It just, you know, totally reinforces Coventry's reputation as a leading, innovative university. They were founded back in eighteen forty three, too, so they have history.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Coventry University, founded in 1843, is ranked among the worlds leading institutions of higher education by many indicators, including the quality of teaching, the best student experience, the level of interaction with students, and satisfaction in the field of business and management.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, sounds like an incredibly positive development for, um, the education landscape in Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, sounds like an incredibly positive development for, um, the education landscape in Kazakhstan.
